concept.title: Company Roles Management
concept.shortdesc: Manage company-level roles on the Role Administration page.

ul.li: View all company roles by description, role code, default indicator, or assigned users
Manage the details for a selected company role, including role types and access rights
View names of employees assigned to a specific role

note.p: The Default column indicates whether the role is a default role. The default roles are New Hire and Terminated.
